languages.text: "Ангел Императора... Будто сам наказующий перст Его воюет на нашей стороне".

traits.locale_text: "Ангел Императора... Будто сам наказующий перст Его воюет на нашей стороне".

languages.text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

languages.text: 「皇帝の天使か…まるで、陛下の裁きの御手がこの戦場に加わったかのようですね」
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の天使か…まるで、陛下の裁きの御手がこの戦場に加わったかのようですね」

languages.text: "Ein Engel des Imperators ... Als hätte seine strafende Hand sich in den Kampf eingemischt."
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Engel des Imperators ... Als hätte seine strafende Hand sich in den Kampf eingemischt."

languages.text: « Un ange de l'Empereur... C'est comme si Sa main punitive s'était jointe à nous. »
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: « Un ange de l'Empereur... C'est comme si Sa main punitive s'était jointe à nous. »

languages.text: «Un ángel del Emperador... Es como si Su mano justiciera se hubiese unido a la contienda».
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: «Un ángel del Emperador... Es como si Su mano justiciera se hubiese unido a la contienda».

languages.text: “是帝皇的天使……祂的惩罚之手亲自加入了这场战斗。”
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: “是帝皇的天使……祂的惩罚之手亲自加入了这场战斗。”

languages.text: "İmparator'un Meleği... Tan İmparator bizi cezalandırmak için sillesini indiriyor sanki."
languages.original_text: "An Angel of the Emperor... It is as if His punishing hand had joined the fray."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un Meleği... Tanrı, bizi cezalandırmak için sillesini indiriyor sanki."
